name: Sandbeach Lake Weekend
description: A sandy beach in the Rocky Mountains? Yes, that's correct.  This 4.5 mile hike in the Rockies is like no other place in the world.  Along the hike you will see epic views, and amazing wildlife, which includes: Elk, Deer, Hawks, Chipmunks, and Rainbow Trout.  Sandbeach Lake, located in the Wild Basin area of the Rocky Mountain National Park, is one of the less visited areas in the park, which allows one epic weekend in the woods!
